alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Palm Beach County through 415 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Golden Lakes, or near Wellington, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Greenacres, Royal Palm Beach, Palm Springs, Haverhill, Golden Lakes, Loxahatchee Groves, Lion Country Safari Park, Gun Club Estates, Schall Circle, Royal Palm Estates, Lake Belvedere Estates, The Acreage, Palm Beach International Airport, Loxahatchee NWR, Aberdeen, Plantation Mobile Home Park, Aberdeen Golf Course and Stacey Street. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
